resources.string: 1. What would you be if you were born on 13th of November
2. The __________ system was developed in Babylonia, some 2,500 years ago, during the "Age of Aries".(fill in the sentence)
3. Which of the following Sanskrit names are not in the list of the twelve signs of modern zodiac?
4. The most common zodiac sign in the US is Capricorn
